name.ja: レグルシュ・ライオンハート

copy: Shy ex-Princess of the Beastman Tribe

twitter.name: レグルシュ・ライオンハート🔔🐾

descriptions.mainCopy:
Grrreetings! 
I'm Reglush Lionheart, a member of NoriPro Gamers! 
I'll be counting on you!
descriptions.subDescription: A former princess of the royal Lionheart family who ran away from her home in the human world from a different world inhabited by beastmen. She wants to make many friends through VTuber activities and fix her introverted personality.
